login.errorMessage: Invalid login credentials. Please double-check your username and password and try again.

gettingStarted.descriptionPlaceholder: Description of organisation with character limit of 500 characters

dataAgreements.pageDescription: Manage Data Agreements for your organisation.
dataAgreements.descritptionInputPlaceholder: Brief description about the usage of data (3-500 characters)
dataAgreements.deleteDADescription1: You are about to delete an existing data agreement and ALL its revisions. Please type
dataAgreements.deleteDADescription2: to confirm and click DELETE. This action is not reversible.
dataAgreements.publishDADescription1: You are about to publish a data agreement. Please type
dataAgreements.publishDADescription2: to confirm and click PUBLISH. This action is not reversible.

personalData.pageDescription: Manage the personal data attributes. Personal data attributes can be used for Internal purposes, can be exposed as a Data Source or is consumed as a Data Using Service.

userAccess.onboardingSuccessMsg: User onboarding in progress. This process may take a little while!
userAccess.onboardingErrorMsg: User onboarding failed. Please try again later
userAccess.pageDescription: Manage how individual users of your organisation can access the privacy board.
userAccess.uploadCSVDescription: Upload existing users via a .csv file using the UPLOAD option.
userAccess.deleteDescription1: You are about to delete an existing user access. Please type
userAccess.deleteDescription2: to confirm and click DELETE. This action is not reversible.

consentRecords.pageDescription: Do queries on the consent records for audit purpose
consentRecords.searchPlaceholder: Search by Individual ID, Consent Record ID, Data Agreement ID

privacyDashboard.pageDescription: Deploy and manage privacy dashboard for your organisation towards end users.

manageAdmin.samePassword: New password and confirm new password should be same

developerAPIs.apiKeyCopyMessage: Here is your new key. Copy it now! This is the only time we will show it you.
developerAPIs.pageDescription: All API requests require you to authenticate using the credentials below
developerAPIs.keyNamePlaceholder: Please type name of api key...
developerAPIs.expiryDatePlaceholder: Please type the expiry in days...
developerAPIs.deleteDescription1: You are about to delete an existing api key. Please type
developerAPIs.deleteDescription2: to confirm and click DELETE. This action is not reversible.

viewLogs.pageDescription: Provides all logs, can also be filtered against various log categories.

webhooks.pageDescription: Manage webhooks for user events. Webhooks allow external services to be notified when certain events happen.
webhooks.deleteDescription1: You are about to delete an existing webhook data. Please type
webhooks.deleteDescription2: to confirm and click DELETE. This action is not reversible.
